changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la génération de: Correction of a bug on the generation of the slack contact url for jeedom

index.md.Ce plugin permet d'établir une connexion: This plugin makes it possible to establish a connection between Slack and Jeedom to send alerts from Jeedom or chat with Jeedom (using interactions)
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il vous: After downloading the plugin, you must activate it, it does not require any other configuration
index.md.La configuration des équipements Slack e: The configuration of Slack equipment is accessible from the Plugins menu
index.md.Voilà à quoi ressemble la page du plugin: This is what the Slack plugin page looks like (here with 1 device already)
index.md.Une fois que vous cliquez sur l'un d'eux: Once you click on one of them, you get
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.nom de domaine de votre Slack (permet no: domain name of your Slack (allows in particular if you have several Slack to differentiate them)
index.md.token de l'api Slack, utile uniquement p: Slack API token, useful only for sending files (capturing a camera for example), see below the method to retrieve it
index.md.c'est l'URL qui faudra donner dans le we: this is the URL that must be given in the Slack webhook (please note that your Jeedom must be accessible from the outside)
index.md.En dessous vous retrouvez la configurati: Below you will find the configuration of the commands
index.md.URL à appeler pour envoyer un message su: URL to call to send a message on Slack
index.md.non obligatoire, permet de forcer l'envo: not mandatory, allows to force the sending of a message to a channel or a user
index.md.permet d'afficher la configuration avanc: displays the advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc.)
index.md.Expéditeur qui vous donne le nom du dern: Sender who gives you the name of the last sender of the message and Message who gives you the message, this can be useful, if you want to do something that is not possible with interactions to trigger a scenario on the arrival of a new one message for example and recover the value of it (we can for example imagine having the message read on Sonos or Karotz)
index.md.et de renseigner une adresse mail et un: and enter an email address and a domain name / company, for example
index.md.Il ne vous reste plus qu'à valider, vous: You just have to validate, you will receive an email, you must click on the link to activate your account and it's good
index.md.Ensuite vous arriverez sur votre Slack: Then you will arrive on your Slack
index.md.À partir de la vous trouvez sur la gauch: From there you find on the left the channels and the users, in the center you can download the Slack app for iOS, Android, Mac or Windows
index.md.Les wekhook permettent à Slack d'informe: The wekhooks allow Slack to inform Jeedom of the arrival of a message and to wait for the response from Jeedom to retransmit it, to do this you must go to the settings
index.md.Tout en bas vous trouverez \"Outgoing We: At the bottom you will find "Outgoing WebHooks
index.md.Vous retrouvez vers le bas de la page le: You will find the different parameters towards the bottom of the page
index.md.non obligatoire, permet de dire à Slack: not required, lets tell Slack to send everything in this Channel to Jeedom
index.md.On peut par exemple créer un channel jus: We can for example create a channel just for Jeedom (more practical than putting a trigger word)
index.md.non obligatoire si vous avez mis un chan: not mandatory if you have put a channel otherwise it is absolutely necessary
index.md.Ce champ permet de définir un mot déclen: This field allows you to define a trigger word for sending to Jeedom, for example if you put Jeedom all your requests must start with Jeedom (ex
index.md.Jeedom combien fait-il dans le chambre): Jeedom how much is he in the room)
index.md.URL à appeler, vous la trouvez sur la pa: URL to call, you find it on your equipment page under Jeedom under the name of "Return URL
index.md.Les autres champs ne sont pas utiles, ho: The other fields are not useful, except maybe the "Customize Name" which allows you to define the name of the Jeedom bot (name with which Jeedom responds), you can also with "Customize Icon" change the icon of Jeedom
index.md.Il faut ensuite cliquer sur \"Save Setti: Then click on "Save Settings" and it's good
index.md.Voilà, vous pouvez parler à Jeedom au tr: There, you can talk to Jeedom through Slack
index.md.N'oubliez pas dans Jeedom de renseigner: Do not forget in Jeedom to enter your domain name (company name), otherwise Jeedom will refuse to answer you (note this field is sensitive to the box)
index.md.Étant donné que Jeedom sépare les équipe: Since Jeedom separates the equipments by domain, it is possible if you have several domains to separate the equipments and therefore the scenarios behind
index.md.Les webhooks entrants permettent à Jeedo: Incoming webhooks allow Jeedom to communicate a message on a channel or directly to a person
index.md.Sans ces webhook Jeedom ne pourra pas pr: Without these webhooks Jeedom will not be able to take the initiative to send you a message
index.md.Pour ce faire il faut aller dans les par: To do this you have to go to the settings
index.md.Tout en bas vous trouverez \"Incoming We: At the very bottom you will find "Incoming WebHooks
index.md.Ensuite, il vous faut choisir un channel: Then, you must choose a channel or a default destination user (you can afterwards specify one per command in Jeedom)
index.md.Cliquez ensuite sur \"Add Incoming WebHo: Then click on "Add Incoming WebHooks Integration
index.md.En bas de la page vous retrouvez les inf: At the bottom of the page you will find the information of the webhook, you just need to retrieve the value of the "Webhook URL" field and copy it into the Webhook field of your order
index.md.Dans le champ destination de la commande: In the destination field of the command in Jeedom you can specify a channel (ex \#monchannel) or a user (ex @toto)
index.md.Voilà, sous Jeedom vous avez juste à sau: Here, under Jeedom you just have to save and there you can from Jeedom send messages on Slack
index.md.Voila comment récupérer votre token pour: Here is how to recover your token so that Jeedom can send files to Slack, and in particular captures from cameras for example
index.md.puis tout en bas aller sur: then at the very bottom go on
index.md.Ici en face de votre équipe, demander à: Here in front of your team, ask Slack to generate the token, it will ask you for your password then send you back to the same page, at the bottom ask for the token again
index.md.Au bout de quelques secondes celui-ci va: After a few seconds it will appear, just copy it into the token field on Jeedom
index.md.Cette étape est optionnelle, elle est ju: This step is optional, it is just useful to send captures of your camera by Slack for example
index.md.Voilà un exemple de ce qu'il est possibl: Here is an example of what it is possible to do once the plugin is correctly configured and the interactions created
index.md.Si vous utilisez la fonction \"ask\" des: If you use the "ask" function of the scenarios, you must send the request on a channel on which Jeedom listens to the answers otherwise your "ask" request will fall into "timeout"
